thread.title: Zlatan Ibrahimovic reminds me of Eric Cantona, says boss of Manchester United's Europa League opponents
thread.title_full: Zlatan Ibrahimovic reminds me of Eric Cantona, says boss of Manchester United's Europa League opponents

author: Aaron Flanagan
title: Zlatan Ibrahimovic reminds me of Eric Cantona, says boss of Manchester United's Europa League opponents
text:
Sport Zlatan Ibrahimovic reminds me of Eric Cantona, says boss of Manchester United's Europa League opponents United face off against St Etienne on Thursday night and the boss sees a link between Ibrahimovic and his childhood friend Share Ibrahimovic has been compared to Cantona (Photo: Getty Images) Share Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
The manager of St Etienne has revealed how Zlatan Ibrahimovic reminds him of Eric Cantona. 
Christophe Galtier is preparing his side for the Europa League clash against Manchester United on Thursday and has admitted his admiration for the Swedish striker. 
Ibrahimovic came up against St Etienne on a number of occasions during his time playing for Paris Saint-Germain in France. 
Galtier, who has been manager at the Stade Geoffroy-Guichard since 2009, grew up with United legend Cantona and says that he can see bits of him in Ibrahimovic. 
Speaking to the Daily Telegraph , he said: "I love those kind of players. They are strong. Very strong. When I look at Ibra I think of Eric Cantona. Big personality. He can get mad in one second, say big things, and then, 'OK, I said it.' Read More Cantona is a United legend (Photo: Mark Thompson/ALLSPORT) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now King Eric speaks after arriving at Elland Road Share this video Watch Next Galtier has seen comparisons (Photo: Getty) 
"But, above all, an incredible player. And he scores. Goals, goals, goals. Lots of people said he would find it difficult in England but, already, 20 goals. 
"He is a great professional. He sets an example. I think that's why they brought him to Manchester. Like Cantona. I have some friends in Paris and they told me all the time: 'If you give the ball here rather than there he will kill you.'" 
Ibrahimovic has been a key man for United as they bid to break into the top four of the Premier League. Ibrahimovic is working towards a new deal at Old Trafford (Photo: PA) View gallery 
And the talisman, who moved on a free last summer on a year's contract, says that he has done enough to earn an additional year. 
Ibrahimovic, 35, said: “Something like that. I have to score 100 goals! The option is already fulfilled from my side. But there’s nothing done yet. We’ll wait and see. Let’s see what happens.” 
Ibrahimovic has scored 20 times for United this season, with 15 of those goals coming in the Premier League. Like us on Facebook
